title: Ro hlu ka nei lawmna thuruk
lyrics:
Ro hlu ka nei, lawmna thuruk,
Ka thinlungah lui angin a luang;
Chatuan hmun thleng pawhin a kang lo vang,
He khawvela m i'n an nei si lo.

Isu, tui nung lui i ni,
Nun tuihala chau tan in tur tak i ni;
Ka tuihal tawh lo vang, he khawvelah hian,
Ka nunna atan Lalpa i tawk a ni.

Ni tin ka nun min siam thatin,
Sual bawih ata min chhandam ta si;
Min hruai thin ni tinin- felna kawngah,
Thlarau Thianghlimin min zirtir thin.

Hmangaihnaa min zawng hmutu,
Chatuan pawhin ka phatsan lo vang;
Ka rul seng chuang lo ve, i thatna hi,
Ka neih nunna nen i ta ka ni.
